data_usage: Global temperature change (relative to 1901-1960) is plotted as a time series.
methodology: The mean temperature for the period 1961-1990 was added to the global average annual temperature anomalies to get the annual temperature time series. Anomalies were then calculated relative to a 1901-1960 reference period by subtracting the 1901-1960 mean temperature from the annual temperatures, and plotted as a time series from 1850 to 2012.
output_artifacts:
HadCRUT.4.1.1.0.annual_ns_avg.txt
